mapper.select: SELECT notice.id , notice.deleted , notice.created_at as createdAt ,SUBSTRING(notice.created_at, 1, 19) as createdAtDateTime , notice.modified_at as modifiedAt , notice.title , notice.content FROM notice WHERE notice.id = #{id}

SELECT notice.id , notice.deleted , notice.created_at as createdAt , notice.modified_at as modifiedAt , notice.title , notice.content FROM notice WHERE notice.id is not NULL AND notice.deleted = #{deleted} AND notice.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') ORDER BY notice.created_at DESC

SELECT notice.id , notice.deleted , notice.created_at as createdAt , notice.modified_at as modifiedAt , notice.title , notice.content FROM notice WHERE notice.id is not NULL AND notice.deleted = #{deleted} AND notice.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') ORDER BY notice.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{perpage}
SELECT count(notice.id) as listsize FROM notice WHERE notice.id is not NULL AND notice.deleted = #{deleted} AND notice.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
